summary: Darker leather, new fabric textures, Midnight Flake breastplate and shoulder protection.
descriptionHtml:
First and foremost I\'d like to thank doodaboom for creating this gorgeous leather armor, and also for granting me permission to make my own interpretation of his creation.

All leather has been darkened, a metal breastplate, epaulets, and shoulder guard have been added, along with a new webbed substrate.

THIS IS MERELY A REPLACER, YOU MUST HAVE DOODABOOM\'S ORIGINAL RELEASE INSTALLED FIRST!!

found here:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7109

This will replace the MALE VERSION armor, boots, gauntlets, quiver, and scabbard.

Female version will be dependent upon number of endorsements, if you download the file, use it and enjoy it, please endorse.

ANY REQUESTS TO MODIFY, REPOST, RERELEASE, ETC MUST BE DIRECTED TO THE ORIGINAL AUTHOR, DOODABOOM!
author: jaredschons
